Seal characters (1)

茭字的基本解释

茭
jiāo
喂牲畜的干草：“峙乃刍茭”。
〔茭白〕菰的嫩茎经某种病菌寄生后膨大，可做蔬菜。
用竹篾或芦苇编成的缆索。

茭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāo］
［《廣韻》古肴切，平肴，見。］
(1)作饲料的干草。
(2)指刈草。参见“茭牧”。
(3)即茭白。
(4)草索。
(5)通“筊”。用竹篾、苇片编成的缆索。
[②]［xiào］
［《集韻》下巧切，上巧，匣。］
草根。
[③]［jī］
［《集韻》吉歷切，入錫，見。］
弓檠。正弓之器。

茭字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　茭； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1028第21
〔古文〕?【唐韻】古肴切【正韻】居肴切，?音交。【說文】乾芻也。【書·費誓】峙乃芻茭。【註】積芻茭供軍牛馬。【韻會】草名。苽，刈取以用曰芻，乾之曰茭，故曰峙乃芻茭。【史記·河渠書】盡河壖棄地，民茭牧其中。　又【爾雅·釋草】茭，牛蘄。【疏】茭似芹菜，可食。【本草註】生水澤中。苗似鬼針，花靑白色，子黃黑色，似防風子。　又【前漢·溝洫志】搴長茭兮湛美玉。【註】竹葦絙謂之茭也，所以引置土石也。　又【集韻】下巧切，同䕧，芰根也。【爾雅·釋草】荺、茭。【註】今江東呼藕經緒如指，空中可啖者爲茇茭，卽此類。　又口敎切，音敲。【揚子·方言】茭媞，欺謾之詞。　又【集韻】吉歷切。【周禮·冬官·弓人註】茭，讀爲激發之激，謂弓檠也。

考證：〔【後漢·溝洫志】搴長茭兮湛美玉。〕　謹照原書後漢改前漢。
茭字的源字形

茭字的起名意思

茭是个多音字，念jiāo时，指蔬类植物。念xiào时，意指草根。念jī，意指弓檠，正弓之器。

wild rice
Basic explanation of words
wild rice
jiāo
Hay for livestock: "Zhi Nai Zizania".
[Zizania] The tender stems of wild rice are swollen after being parasitized by a certain pathogen, and can be used as vegetables.
A cable made of bamboo sticks or reeds.
wild rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāo］
["Guangyun" ancient dishes cut, flat dishes, see. ]
(1) Hay used as fodder.
(2) Refers to mowing. See "Zianmu".
(3) That is Zizania.
(4) Grass rope.
(5) Through "筊". A cable made of bamboo sticks and reeds.
[②]［xiào］
["Ji Yun" Qiao cut at the bottom, Qiao at the top, box. ]
Grassroots.
[③]［jī］
["Jiyun" Jili cut, enter the tin, see. ]
Bow bark. The bow of the bow.
wild rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　茭; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1028-21
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Ancient food cut [Zhengyun] Jujue cut, sound exchange. [Said the text] It's also dry. [Book·Fei Oath] Zhi is a humble sap. [Note] Accumulated wild rice for military cattle and horses. [Rhyme Club] Cursive name. Zhu, is taken for use as a stalk, and dried as a sap, so it is called a sap. [Historical Records · River Channel Book] Exhaust the river and waste the land, where the people and wild horses are herding.　[Erya·Shucao] Zizania, cattle cymbal. 【Sparse】Zizania is edible like celery. [Materia Medica] Raw water and Zezhong. The seedlings resemble ghost needles, the flowers are white, and the seeds are yellow-black, resembling wind-proof seeds.　[Previous Han·Gou Xia Zhi] grows long and beautiful jade. [Note] The bamboo reed 絙 is called Zizania, so the earth and stone are also introduced.　[Jiyun] Next, the same is the same, the root is also. 【Erya·Shuicao】Nun, Zizania. [Note] Nowadays, Jiangdong Hu Lotus Jingxue is like a finger, and those who can be swayed in the air are long Jiao, and such.　 I cut my mouth again, and clicked. 【Yangtze Dialect】Zhaoya, a word of deceit.　[Jiyun] Ji Liqie. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan·Gongren's Note】Zizania, read as the excitement of excitement, it is also called the bow. wild rice
Name meaning
Zizania is a polyphonic word. When pronounced jiāo, it refers to vegetables like plants. When xiào is pronounced, it means grass roots. Nian jī means the bow, the tool of the bow.
jiāo, jī, xiǎo
сущ.
1) jiāo сено, сухая трава
茭藁 сено, фураж
2) jiāo бот. цицания широколистная, тускарора, дикий рис (Zizania latifolia Hance)
3) jiāo * канат (верёвка) из бамбукового лыка; ствол бамбука
搴长茭, 沉美玉 схватить длинную верёвку (длинный ствол) и утопить лучший самоцвет
4) xiǎo * съедобные корни травянистых растений; съедобные ростки (напр. бамбука)
5) jī * футляр для лука
